properties.entry: INSERT INTO NEWS ( NEWS_NO , USER_ID , NEWS_CATE , POST_NO , NEWS_STATUS , NEWS_DATE ) SELECT SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , USER_ID , 0 , CHALL_NO , 'Y' , SYSDATE FROM CHALL_STATUS WHERE CHALL_NO = ? AND CHALL_STATUS !=0
INSERT INTO NEWS ( NEWS_NO , USER_ID , NEWS_CATE , POST_NO , NEWS_STATUS , NEWS_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , (SELECT REPORTED_ID FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = ?) , 1 , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )

SELECT NEWS_NO, NEWS_CATE, POST_NO, CASE WHEN NEWS_CATE =0 THEN (SELECT CHALL_TITLE FROM CHALL WHERE CHALL_NO = POST_NO) WHEN NEWS_CATE =1 THEN (SELECT REPORT_TITLE FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = POST_NO) WHEN NEWS_CATE =2 THEN (SELECT QNA_TITLE FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = POST_NO) END AS NEWS_TITLE FROM NEWS WHERE USER_ID = ? AND NEWS_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NEWS SET NEWS_STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = ? AND NEWS_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO NEWS ( NEWS_NO , USER_ID , NEWS_CATE , POST_NO , NEWS_STATUS , NEWS_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , (SELECT USER_ID FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = ?) , 2 , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
